Debian Logo

Can I use Whonix ™ for Debian inside VirtualBox ? Yes!


Whonix ™ for Windows, macOS and Linux runs inside VirtualBox (FREE). There are 2 options for you to choose:

Option 1 : Graphical User Interface (Whonix ™ with Xfce)[edit]

  • Beginner-friendly
  • Easy to use

Option 2 : Text Terminal Only (Whonix ™ with CLI)[edit]

  • Advanced users
  • Low system requirements

Questions and Answers[edit]

  • Can I combine Whonix-Gateway ™ CLI with Whonix-Workstation ™ Xfce? Yes, you can! Learn more.
  • Why use VirtualBox over KVM?
  • Why use VirtualBox over Qubes?
  • FAQ
